languages.text: "Будет сделано. Урбенд, поди, и не надеялся, что парень принесет семье хоть какую-то пользу. Теперь лет десять будем слушать о "крови Драйвстемов, которая всегда стремится к высотам". Тьфу".

"Will do. I bet Urbend never thought the boy would be of any use to the family. Now we will have to endure a decade of him boasting about 'the Drivestem blood that always strives for great heights.' Tch."
languages.original_text: "Будет сделано. Урбенд, поди, и не надеялся, что парень принесет семье хоть какую-то пользу. Теперь лет десять будем слушать о "крови Драйвстемов, которая всегда стремится к высотам". Тьфу".

traits.locale_text: "Will do." {n}Abelard mutters to himself,{/n} "I bet Urbend never thought the boy would be of any use to the family. Now we will have to endure a decade of him boasting about 'the Drivestem blood that always strives for great heights'. Tch."

"Will do." {n}Abelard mutters to himself,{/n} "I bet Urbend never thought the boy would be of any use to the family. Now we will have to endure a decade of him boasting about 'the Drivestem blood that always strives for great heights'. Tch."

"Will do. I bet Urbend never thought the boy would be of any use to the family. Now we will have to endure a decade of him boasting about 'the Drivestem blood that always strives for great heights.' Tch."

"Will do. I bet Urbend never thought the boy would be of any use to the family. Now we will have to endure a decade of him boasting about 'the Drivestem blood that always strives for great heights.' Tch."

"Will do. I bet Urbend never thought the boy would be of any use to the family. Now we will have to endure a decade of him boasting about 'the Drivestem blood that always strives for great heights.' Tch."

languages.text: «Así se hará. Seguro que Urbend pensaba que el muchacho era causa perdida para la familia. Ahora tendremos que soportar una década de escucharle decir que "la sangre Drivestem siempre busca las más altas cotas". Bah».
languages.original_text: "Will do. I bet Urbend never thought the boy would be of any use to the family. Now we will have to endure a decade of him boasting about 'the Drivestem blood that always strives for great heights.' Tch."

traits.locale_text: «Así se hará. Seguro que Urbend pensaba que el muchacho era causa perdida para la familia. Ahora tendremos que soportar una década de escucharle decir que "la sangre Drivestem siempre busca las más altas cotas". Bah».

languages.text: « Sans faute. Je parie qu'Urbend n'aurait jamais imaginé que ce garçon puisse être un jour utile à la cause familiale. Il va certainement nous rebattre les oreilles pendant plusieurs décennies au sujet du "sang des Drivestem" qui serait "destiné à la grandeur". Pff. »
languages.original_text: "Will do. I bet Urbend never thought the boy would be of any use to the family. Now we will have to endure a decade of him boasting about 'the Drivestem blood that always strives for great heights.' Tch."

traits.locale_text: « Sans faute. Je parie qu'Urbend n'aurait jamais imaginé que ce garçon puisse être un jour utile à la cause familiale. Il va certainement nous rebattre les oreilles pendant plusieurs décennies au sujet du "sang des Drivestem" qui serait "destiné à la grandeur". Pff. »

languages.text: “当然。我敢打赌，厄本做梦也没想到这个孩子会给家族带来如此荣耀。只不过在接下来的十年里，我们得忍受他逢人便要吹嘘‘德莱夫斯塔家个个有出息’了，啧。”
languages.original_text: "Will do. I bet Urbend never thought the boy would be of any use to the family. Now we will have to endure a decade of him boasting about 'the Drivestem blood that always strives for great heights.' Tch."

traits.locale_text: “当然。我敢打赌，厄本做梦也没想到这个孩子会给家族带来如此荣耀。只不过在接下来的十年里，我们得忍受他逢人便要吹嘘‘德莱夫斯塔家个个有出息’了，啧。”

languages.text: 「そうでしょうな。アーベンドは、あの子が一族の役に立つとは思ってもみなかったでしょう。これで我々は、彼が『常に高みを目指すドライブステムの血』を自慢する10年間に耐えなければなりません」
languages.original_text: "Will do. I bet Urbend never thought the boy would be of any use to the family. Now we will have to endure a decade of him boasting about 'the Drivestem blood that always strives for great heights.' Tch."

traits.locale_text: 「そうでしょうな。アーベンドは、あの子が一族の役に立つとは思ってもみなかったでしょう。これで我々は、彼が『常に高みを目指すドライブステムの血』を自慢する10年間に耐えなければなりません」

languages.text: "Wird erledigt. Urbend hätte bestimmt nie gedacht, dass der Knabe für die Familie einmal von Nutzen sein würde. Nun müssen wir ein Jahrzehnt lang sein Geprahle ertragen, vom 'Drivestem-Blut, das stets zu höchsten Höhen strebt'. Tzz."
languages.original_text: "Will do. I bet Urbend never thought the boy would be of any use to the family. Now we will have to endure a decade of him boasting about 'the Drivestem blood that always strives for great heights.' Tch."

traits.locale_text: "Wird erledigt. Urbend hätte bestimmt nie gedacht, dass der Knabe für die Familie einmal von Nutzen sein würde. Nun müssen wir ein Jahrzehnt lang sein Geprahle ertragen, vom 'Drivestem-Blut, das stets zu höchsten Höhen strebt'. Tzz."

languages.text: "Başüstüne. Urbend'in delikanlının aileye hiçbir faydasının olmayacağını düşündüğünden eminim. Şimdiyse on yıl boyunca 'Drivestem ailesinin her zaman daha ilerisini hedeflediğine' dair böbürlenmesine katlanmamız gerekecek. Hıh."
languages.original_text: "Will do. I bet Urbend never thought the boy would be of any use to the family. Now we will have to endure a decade of him boasting about 'the Drivestem blood that always strives for great heights.' Tch."
